type: Digital Design System, Product Concept, Visual Design, Website

Project Information.block: We were invited by B.O.B to develop an institutional campaign aimed at increasing brand recognition and boosting sales for both the high-end target audience and new segments.
Project Information.block-3: Our task included identifying the key communication channels, creating the campaign narrative and storytelling, and devising the launch strategy. Part of our challenge was also to analyze the brand's strength relative to its competitors and define a strategic positioning for the brand through this campaign.

credits.design: Design —— Caio Couto, Gabriel Miranda & Vinícius Queiróz
credits.motion: Motion design —— Caio Couto, Rodrigo Tavares & Vinícius Queiróz
credits.strategy: Tone of voice —— Gabriel Miranda, Louis Vidovix & Thamires Crepaldi

Project Information.block: O trabalho é resultado da atividade final do curso Base. O módulo foi ministrado pelo professor Edgard Kozlowski, do Aprender Design School.
Project Information.block-2: A atividade tem como proposta explorar e aplicar todos os conceitos exibidos durante as classes. Cada grupo recebe um tema e lista de funcionalidades que a aplicação precisa explorar.
Project Information.block-3: WISH TEM COMO OBJETIVO AJUDAR USUÁRIOS A PLANEJAR SUAS FUTURAS COMPRAS CRIANDO WISHLISTS, explorando listas públicas e rebendo alertas promocionais.

credits.group: Jordy Kuster, Luiza Ongaratto, Meyrele Nascimento e Vinícius Queiróz.
credits.type-2: IBM Plex mono by Mike Abbink.

Project Information.block: The layout was designed to reflect the essence of Gole Studio, a boutique design firm that forms strategic partnerships with companies seeking greatness. The minimalist design prioritizes content, highlighting projects in a clear and impactful manner. Each element is carefully crafted to ensure a smooth and intuitive visual experience, allowing the brands created by the studio to stand out without distractions.
Project Information.block-3: Designed to create a clean, modern, and sophisticated interface, it communicates the studio’s signature high-impact approach while maintaining a focus on the visual storytelling of each project. The design system follows the same principles of simplicity and efficiency, ensuring consistency and ease of use throughout all phases, from creation to the final handoff.

credits.dir: Creative direction —— Gabriel Miranda & Vinícius Queiróz
credits.motion: Motion design —— Caio Couto & Vinícius Queiróz

type: Digital Design System, E-commerce, Visual Identity

Project Information.block: Inspired by the work of Heinrich Fleischhacker, who frequently used binary numbers, Baudot code, and impact printers (dot matrix printers) in his pieces.
Project Information.block-2: The material incorporates the traditional elements of a calendar (dates, holidays, and days of the week) combined with both vertical and horizontal orientations, creating a visual noise and an unconventional use.

Print details.type: Type in use —— Neue Montreal by @pangram.pangram
Print details.print: Paper and Colors —— Couché 300g/m2, 100% Yellow and 100% Black on CYMK Scale
